mapper.select: select cid,title,slug,created,modified,content,type,tags,categories,hits,commentsNum,allowComment,allowPing,allowFeed,status,author,date_format(gtmCreate,'%Y-%m-%d %T') gtmCreate,date_format(gtmModified,'%Y-%m-%d %T') gtmModified from blog_content where cid = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into blog_content ( title, slug, created, modified, content, type, tags, categories, hits, commentsNum, allowComment, allowPing, allowFeed, status, author, gtmCreate, gtmModified ) values ( #{title}, #{slug}, #{created}, #{modified}, #{content}, #{type}, #{tags}, #{categories}, #{hits}, #{commentsNum}, #{allowComment}, #{allowPing}, #{allowFeed}, #{status}, #{author}, #{gtmCreate}, #{gtmModified} )
mapper.delete:
